hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Shaqiq said:"I asked Aishah about the Salat of Allah's Messenger (S). She said: 'He would pray four Rak'ah before Az-Zuhr and two Rak'ah after it, and two after Al-Maghrib, and two Rak'ah after Al-Isha, and two before Al-Fajr

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الرَّكْعَتَيْنِ بَعْدَ الْعِشَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Two Rak'ah After Isha
